channel.description: Two Integers Output 50 <class 'int'> Code x = 5 y = 10 z = x * y print(z) print(type(z)) Division - Always Float Output 3.0 <class 'float'> 2.25 <class 'float'> Code a = 9 b = 3 c = 4 x = a / b print(x) print(type(x)) print() y = a / c print(y) print(type(y)) Two Floats Output 7.0 <class 'float'> Code a = 2.5 b = 4.5 c = a + b print(c) print(type(c)) Mixed - Always Float Output 3.
